body: It isn't clear that there is anything actionable here. Thanks for all the data collection @rayborn. I'm going to close this, as I don't think there is any more we can do. Cloned profiles are probably always going to be an issue, and just something we're going to have to deal with in data analysis. I'm confident that normal users aren't getting double prompted.
